text:
Spartan Software in San Francisco is looking for a Software Engineer

We’re hiring talented Software Engineers to join our small team of localization experts.

* Design cost-effective translation automation solutions for our customers. * Develop world-class engineering products for our customers. * Participate in open source initiatives. This is a big one here and we can’t wait to tell you more about this in person!

We’re looking for: * 2+ years of Java experience. * 2+ years of professional software engineering experience. * Experience developing a web application or web-based internal tool. * Interest in learning new technologies and contributions to open source. Feel free to share a link to a project you’re proud of or your GitHub. * Strong communication skills and an interest in communicating occasionally with clients. * Experience with relational database/MySQL design. * Bachelor’s degree in a STEM field.

We’re offering: * Competitive salary and annual bonus structure. * Fidelity SIMPLE IRA to help you save for the future. * Full medical and dental benefits. We cover 100% of the premiums for employees. * 15 days PTO + 10 paid holidays off annually + the day off on your birthday * Opportunity to travel internationally to attend industry events and conferences. * Relaxed office close to Muni and bus lines near Golden Gate park. * We do a lot of team lunches and 1-on-1s here. We believe very strongly in the importance and benefits of setting aside time to talk, whether it’s on your team or with company leadership members. We’re a place where we encourage you to have your voice heard. * We value work-life balance here at Spartan, which means regular work hours and flexible schedules so you can manage your priorities outside the office :)

Love Spartan but want to work remotely? We're open to remote employees, as long as they want to travel to SF as needed.

How To Apply: http://www.thesourcery.com/jobs/932
